com.kris.projects.banktransactions.config

Class BankTransactionConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kris.projects.banktransactions.config.BankTransactionConfig

  • @Configuration
 @EnableBatchProcessing
 @Import(value=BatchScheduler.class)
 @EnableScheduling
public class BankTransactionConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    SpringBatch Configuration class Contains @EnableBatchProcessing annotation - to enable Spring Batch Contains @EnableScheduling to enable Spring scheduler Imports BatchScheduler, custom Spring Scheduler to launch the job
    Author:
    Krishna Angeras

      Method to build all the steps and execute the job using JobBuilderFactory Before and After job will be implemented in BankTransactionListener

      Method to schedule cron job.
      BankTransactionProcessor processor()
      ItemProcessor Bean Scope is set to StepScope ie a new instance will be created for each step

    • Method Detail

      • reader

        @Bean
 @StepScope
public org.springframework.batch.item.file.FlatFileItemReader<BankTransactionDTO> reader()
        ItemReader Bean to read the csv file using FlatFileItemReader. Scope is set to StepScope ie a new instance will be created for each step
        Returns:
        FlatFileItemReader implementation of ItemReader

      • processor

        @Bean
 @StepScope
public BankTransactionProcessor processor()
        ItemProcessor Bean Scope is set to StepScope ie a new instance will be created for each step
        Returns:
        BankTransactionProcessor new instance

      • writer

        @Bean
 @StepScope
public org.springframework.batch.item.database.JdbcBatchItemWriter<BankTransactionDTO> writer()
        ItemWriter bean to write data into db tables using JdbcBatchItemWriter Scope is set to StepScope ie a new instance will be created for each step
        Returns:
        JdbcBatchItemWriter implementation of ItemWriter

      • perform

        @Scheduled(cron="00 51 02 * * *")
public void perform()
        Method to schedule cron job. This method in turn uses the JobLauncher to launch the job defined in the Listener bean

      • listenerJob

        public org.springframework.batch.core.Job listenerJob(BankTransactionListener listener)
        Method to build all the steps and execute the job using JobBuilderFactory Before and After job will be implemented in BankTransactionListener
        Parameters:
        listener - BankTransactionListener object
        Returns:
        Job

      • invalidTransactions

        @Bean
public org.springframework.batch.core.step.skip.SkipPolicy invalidTransactions()
        Method to define skip policy. In this case, the implementation skips few exceptions like ParseException, IncorrectTokenCountException, etc
        Returns:
        InvalidBankTransactions SkipPolicy

      • step1

        @Bean
public org.springframework.batch.core.Step step1()
        Method to build step1 with reader, processor, writer and skip policy and return the step using StepBuilderFactory
        Returns:
        Step1
